full_description:
SanDisk Professional G-DRIVE Enterprise-Class 6TB External HDD

SanDisk Professional G-DRIVE Enterprise-Class 6TB External HDD is a 6TB G-DRIVE Enterprise-Class USB 3.2 Gen 1 External Hard Drive from SanDisk Professional. It delivers reliable, high-capacity storage. Featuring an Ultrastar Enterprise-class hard drive with a capacity of 6TB encased within a durable aluminum enclosure, the G-DRIVE performs quick backups and provides fast access to videos, photos, music, and other documents. This 7200 rpm drive connects to your host system using a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C port which provides data-transfer speeds of up to 250 MB/s. Powered by an included AC adapter, the G-DRIVE's USB Type-C port delivers 45W of power for your compatible laptop or other devices, meaning you won't need to carry multiple power supplies. The SanDisk Professional's G-DRIVE comes preformatted for macOS 10.12 and later and is Time Machine compatible, but may be used with Windows 10 and later after a simple reformat. For simple connectivity to your host system, USB Type-C to Type-C and Type-C to Type-A cables are included. For all your demanding workloads and mission-critical content, you can rely on the power and reliability of the 7200 rpm Ultrastar Enterprise-class hard drive. With an anodized aluminum enclosure, the G-DRIVE pairs well with your computer and gives you durable strength. It is Support up to 45Watts of USB Power Delivery through the USB Type-C port and allows you to charge your compatible MacBook or MacBook Pro without having to take a separate charger out of your bag. It is also Mac Ready and Apple Time Machine Compatible. SanDisk Professional G-DRIVE Enterprise-Class 6TB External HDD offers a 1-Year Warranty.

It also comes with an anodized aluminum enclosure. So the G-DRIVE PRO pairs with your computer and gives you durable strength. This Enterprise-Class 7200 rpm Ultrastar Drive is good for all your demanding workloads and mission-critical content, you can rely on the power and enhanced reliability of the enterprise-class Ultrastar 7200 rpm HDD. This drive is also Mac Ready and Apple Time Machine Compatible. So it is Ready to go for Mac computers and Apple Time Machine backup right out of the box. You can also easily reformat this for Windows and Windows Backup. SanDisk Professional G-DRIVE Pro 6TB Thunderbolt External HDD offers a 1-Year Warranty.

full_description:
SanDisk Professional G-DRIVE Enterprise-Class 12TB USB 3.2 Gen 2 External HDD

The SanDisk Professional G-DRIVE Enterprise-Class 12TB USB 3.2 Gen 2 External HDD is a large-capacity storage solution built for professionals that need dependable and quick data storage. The USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C Interface provides rapid data transfer speeds of up to 250 MB/s, allowing you to transfer files between devices quickly. It is powered by AC, ensuring steady power and performance, and the 7200 rpm Enterprise-Class Ultrastar HDD offers dependable and quick data access. The stackable metal shell is meant to safeguard your data from harm and has two anchor points for securing the drive in place. Furthermore, the plug-and-play architecture makes it simple to set up and operate, as no additional software or drivers are required. The SanDisk Professional G-DRIVE Enterprise-Class 12TB USB 3.2 Gen 2 External HDD is preformatted for macOS 10.12 and later, making it compatible with Apple devices. But, it is also Windows compatible, with the option to reformat for Windows users. Overall, this external hard drive is a dependable and effective storage choice for professionals that need a lot of storage capacity and quick data transfer speeds.

title: SanDisk Professional G-RAID 2 12TB 2-Bay RAID Array External HDD
cat_seo_title: SanDisk Portable Hard Disk Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy SanDisk Portable Hard Disk at best price in Bangladesh. Latest SanDisk Portable External HDD available at Star Tech Shop. Order online to get delivery anywhere in BD.
cat_seo_keywords: SanDisk Portable External Hard Disk, SanDisk Portable External Hard Drive, SanDisk Portable HDD
full_description:
SanDisk Professional G-RAID 2 12TB 2-Bay RAID Array External HDD

SanDisk Professional G-RAID 2 12TB 2-Bay RAID Array External HDD is designed to provide flexibility and reliability for demanding applications, the G-RAID 2 12TB 2-Bay RAID Array from SanDisk Professional is a fast, high-capacity storage solution that supports multi-stream HD, 2K, 4K, and HDR video workflows. Equipped with an overall capacity of 12TB that is made of 2 x 6TB 7200 RPM Ultrastar Enterprise-class hard drives, the G-RAID 2 delivers data transfer speeds of up to 500 MB/s. In terms of connectivity, this array is equipped with two 40 Gb/s Thunderbolt 3 ports, one 10 Gb/s USB Type-C port, and one HDMI port. While host connectivity is achieved using one of the Thunderbolt 3 ports, or the USB Type-C port, the second Thunderbolt 3 port remains available for daisy-chaining up to five additional devices, including drives, 4K displays, and more, all through a single cable connection. SanDisk Professional built the G-RAID 2 with a hardware RAID controller that supports RAID 0, which provides enhanced performance, and RAID 1, which supports 1:1 drive mirroring, although this halves the total capacity. For those who do not need a RAID, JBOD is also available. The system comes preconfigured as RAID 0 and formatted for macOS 10.12 and later, although the system may be reformatted for Windows 10. Included is a 20 Gb/s Thunderbolt 3 cable, a USB Type-C to Type-A cable, a power cable, and an AC power adapter. For maximum performance, the G-RAID 2 comes ready to go in RAID 0 and can be configured to RAID 1 (mirroring) or JBOD for ultimate flexibility. SanDisk Professional G-RAID 2 12TB 2-Bay RAID Array External HDD offers a 1-Year Warranty.
